```{r}
persons <- persons %>% 
  mutate(birthdate = year_of_birth*10000+month_of_birth*100+day_of_birth,
         age = 2017 - year_of_birth,
         age_bands = cut(age, 
                         breaks = c(0,19,39,59,79,Inf), 
                         include.lowest = T,include.highest = T, 
                         labels = c("[0,19]",'[20,39]', '[40,59]', '[60,79]', '[80+]')))
```
